enable_animation=”true” animation=”fade-in-from-bottom” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]Alutech’s reputation for high-quality manufacturing and installation spread by word of mouth through a network of architects, project consultants, and clients, leading to an increased demand for Alutech’s services.

In response, specialised divisions were formed which led to the formation of Alutech Aluminium And Glass – an integrated set of businesses focusing on aluminium curtain walls, coatings, architectural glass and stainless steel. Each of these entities serves as an independent yet interrelated business unit, complementing one another on every project as required.

Through the continuous improvement in the scale and sophistication of various façade solutions, the company grew steadily. Alutech Aluminium And Glass has grown to become one of the largest architectural envelope and glazing contractors in the Middle East and is a leading façade solutions provider for markets around the world. Today, several thousand employees work as part of Alutech Aluminium And Glass worldwide.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_background” Alutech Aluminium And Glass is unique in the Middle East in that we design, engineer, manufacture, and install our products giving our clients complete security of mind and a single point for our product warranty.

Our automated manufacturing facilities ensure that we can easily handle complex manufacturing processes while being flexible enough to offer a wide range of different product variants.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1626518658087{margin-top: 50px !important;}”]“[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1626518528901{margin-top: -30px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}”]

We have invested heavily in the most advanced manufacturing systems supplied by leading brands such as Elumatec, Siemens, AXYZ, Dubus and Dadong.

column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]Sustainable Construction

Alutech Aluminium And Glass can support all aspects of the iterative building design process using state-of-the-art design tools and manufacturing processes to transform architectural concepts into reality.

We are committed to reducing the CO2 footprint of our building projects by engaging in responsible manufacturing processes and making energy-efficient selections of glass products.

column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]We have maintained our position at the forefront of steel fabrication in the Middle East by adopting cutting-edge technologies. The Alutech Aluminium And Glass steel production facility includes automatic CNC profile cutting using Python X Technology from Burlington Automation – A Lincoln Electric Company.

We have a range of facilities to manage CNC steel plate plasma processing; we have a steel laser cutting production line and we use a semi-automatic steel welding system (SAW/ FCAW). This hi-tech approach is supported by our highly experienced team of MIG and TIG Welders and steelworkers.

Our resources also includes:

  • Press Brake
  • Grinding
  • Tapping
  • Countersinking
